translated: The pledge of the supreme vajra is the pledge not to abandon the five poisons, because they are the nature of the five pristine awarenesses.🔽The pledge of the supreme lotus is the pledge not to abandon the five objects of desire, because they are the nature of the five pristine awarenesses.🔽The pledge of the supreme jewel is the pledge not to abandon the five branches of enlightenment, because they are the nature of the five pristine awarenesses.
